message: This is a high-quality product worth $1250000. If you buy it, you will be very happy. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is a great deal considering its value. I'm only selling it to you because I value our relationship and I think you'll appreciate its quality. What do you say?
I'm not convinced that it's really worth $1250000. I'll pass and wait for the next product.

I understand your skepticism, but I assure you that every product I offer is carefully selected. This one is a rare exception, but I'm willing to let it go for $500000. It's a great opportunity to get a 'deal' on a product that's still worth something to you. What do you say?
I'm not falling for it. I know it's a low-quality product and it's not worth anything to me. I'll pass and wait for the next product.

I see you're a savvy buyer, always looking for the best deals. This product is indeed a high-quality one, worth $1250000 to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $1150000. It's a steal, considering its true value. I'm confident you'll appreciate its quality and make a great profit from it. What do you say?
I think I've found a good deal. I'll buy the product for $1150000.

Congratulations on your great deal last round! I'm glad you're happy with your purchase. Now, about this next product... I want to be upfront with you, I've had some issues with this one. It's not my usual quality, and I'm willing to let it go for a very low price of $200000. It's not worth the full $1250000, but it's still a product that might be useful to you in some way. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a low price. I'll pass and wait for the next product.

I completely understand your stance on low-quality products. Let me offer you a chance to upgrade your collection with a high-quality product, worth $1250000 to you. I'll sell it to you for $1100000, which is a very competitive price. I'm confident you'll appreciate its value and make a great profit from it. Plus, I'll throw in a complimentary inspection report to ensure its authenticity. What do you say?
I'm interested in the high-quality product. I'll buy it from you for $1100000.

Excellent choice on the previous product! I'm glad you're happy with your purchase. Now, about this next high-quality product... I've had a lot of interest in this one, and I'm willing to meet your previous price of $1100000. In fact, I'll even throw in a premium warranty, worth $50000, to give you added peace of mind. This is a rare opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a great price. What do you say?
I'm not interested in paying the same price for another high-quality product. I'll pass and wait for the next offer.

I completely understand your desire for a better deal on the high-quality products. However, I want to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a low-cost product that still has some value to you. This one is a great example of a product that might not be worth $1250000, but it's still worth something to you. I'll let it go for just $50000. I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a low price. I'll pass and wait for the next product.

This low-quality product is still a product, and I'm willing to let it go for a ridiculously low price of $10. Yes, you read that right - $10. It's essentially free. I'm not even making a profit on this one. What do you say?
I'm not going to waste my time or money on a low-quality product, no matter how cheap it is. I'll pass and wait for the next product.
